issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: tools/rumen
components.description: A tool for parsing and manipulating job history traces for use in simulation and benchmarking.

fields.description: GridMix fails to start trowing NPE after gendata
fields.summary: lGridMix fails to Run with NPE with latest branch-0.23 code

Where as trace is having nearly 1200 jobs

This is a duplicate of MAPREDUCE-3770.

Karam, I am closing this and marking MAPREDUCE-3770 for 0.23. I am also adding you to the watch list there.
